definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (poss. two hollows, caves, ravines, v. [[בֵּית חוֹרׂן]])—[[דֶּרָח חרונים]] Is 15:5, Je 48:3, [[מוֹרַד חׂרוֹנׇ֑יִם]] Je 48:5, [[חׂרׂיִם]] Je 48:34, city of Moab; = MI:31.32 [[חורנן]] (i.e. prob. [[חוֹרׂנֵן]]); LXX Arwnieim, Wrwnsim.—On [[חׂרׂנַיִם]] LXX Jos 13:10, Jos 13:11, 2Sa 13:34 v. We Dr and [[בֵּית חוֹרׂן]].
